## Introduction

## Preparing the data

```{r}
beers <- read.csv("Beers.csv")
breweries <- read.csv("Breweries.csv")
head(beers)
head(breweries)
```

### How Many Breweries?

Rank each state by how many breweries they have.

```{r}
breweries_states <- breweries %>%
  group_by(State) %>%
  summarise(Freq = count(State))
head(breweries_states)
```
